alert.note: Alert for Frederick (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:54PM EDT until July 12 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL...EAST CENTRAL FREDERICK COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND AND WEST CENTRAL BALTIMORE COUNTIES IN NORTHERN MARYLAND... At 453 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eldersburg, or 10 miles south of Westminster, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Baltimore, Pikesville, Westminster, Randallstown, Owings Mills, Eldersburg, Milford Mill, Reisterstown, Lochearn, Mount Airy, Sykesville, Oakland, Gamber, Garrison, New Windsor, Finksburg, Carrollton, Upperco, Henryton and Winfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
